title: Yasuo or Zed?
body:
Should I get
A. Yasuo
B. Zed

Yasuo: Pros & Cons.

Pros:
Yasuo is very, VERY broken
He doesn't use a resource (Rage, Fury, mana, focus, etc*)
His e has a 0.1 second cooldown
His q sends out a tornado that knocks you up in the air
He gets 2x the crit chance
Ult destroys everything
Despite having a full difficulty bar, has a very low skill cap

Cons:
Yasuo will likely be nerfed soon


Zed: Pros & Cons

Pros:
A... bit broken, but not insanely.
Passive deals extra magic damage to people under 50% health
W creates a mimicking shadow that he can teleport to
Ultimate destroys enemies
Pretty easy to play

Cons:
Zed cannot spam his abilities, as he has Focus.

Please reply, as I want one of these two and don't know which one to get

If you don't think i should get any of these and instead get another Champion i will look into it

Thanks.

replies.body:
Please, just please don't get either.

Buy a real champ, there is already a Yasuo in every game, and NO ONE needs any more of them around.
Nah, I'll get Zed, since Championship Zed is around the corner and he counters Yas-u-CANCER.

Chemotherapy does kill cancer its true, but much of the time it causes more harm than good.

So think about that. 

maybe get a real champion like Aurelion Sol or Anivia.

> [{quoted}](name=Lord Sesshomaru,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=uhflKGzn,comment-id=000200000000,timestamp=2016-09-11T06:21:17.102+0000)
>
> Chemotherapy does kill cancer its true, but much of the time it causes more harm than good.
> 
> So think about that. 

This analogy was enjoyed
im glad haha xD

Yasuo is a easy champ to play but a little difficult to master the combo, zed is similar but easily to get a good grasp his combo. If you want a slightly challenging champ then go for Yas{{champion:157}}
Much appreciated, I'm getting some rp in an hour or so.
RP? its worth buying champs with IP and save the RP for the sweet skins to brag about
k, BUT IT'S HARD GETTING IP WHEN EVERY GAME YOU LOSE CAUSE THERE'S ANOTHER FRICKEN YASUO
The highest I saved up is 13.9K IP which I used to change my name, and good thing is Yasuo is likely gonna get a nerf if his win rate is really high up there.
Lol what? Zed is harder than yasuo lmao.

no no no. you mis-read it. I didn't say zed has a harder skill floor I said zed is similar; easy to play where his combo and skills is easy to grasp onto, there is nothing difficult for any players to learn to play him
Zed is nowhere easy to play. You actually need skills to play zed lol

I played zed once and I almost instantly got a hang of his skills and his combos, he's not hard just requires a somewhat amount of knowledge and you'll be able to make plays. Not sure how you found difficult to master.
Im pretty sure you guys have not played Zed against high elo players.
Don't know why you're bringing in elo as I was talking about skill floor. Besides Im getting real tired of this
Because low elo = don't know how to play against a Zed therefore giving the impression of Zed being an easy champion. In high elo, people actually know how to counter him and render him useless.

OH MY GODD. 

Im gonna shut this down.

First of all Im talking about the skill floor of zed, never did I talked about countering him in what elo.

Your able to grab an easy grib on his combo like I did and I aint even in high elo.

And Zed is popular so people should know how his abilities if not then they are just plain idiots unless they are new given the circumstances.

Considering your in Silver, the grip on his combo is still easy but using it smartly to either sneak away or get a kill smoothly like how you seen in the LCS, they use their abilities in a way to execute their combo smoothly.

If u find playing zed difficult then you must be a slow learner, or just not have enough time to invest into zed.

And before I close, you said "you actually need skills to play zed" I have to admit that your correct but it doesn't take you 25 or 30 games to learn how to use his abilities, it takes more skills to execute his combo smoothly without making a mistake out of panic.

It comes down to zed being easy to HAVE A GOOD IDEA OF HIS ABILITIES BUT REQUIRE A BIT MORE SKILL TO EXECUTE HIS ABILITIES PROPERLY.

You press R, Put your cursor on the enemy, press all the other buttons, auto once, press R.

Yep... cant think how that could possibly be easy.

Best mastery is thunderlords as everyone should know. I sometimes go by the combo of W+E+Q and if nesscerily to finish off with ult. By the time I W,E,Q ; my  proceed thunderlords. combos I've seen are either WEQR or RWEQW.
His Q is a skill shot ability. I'm pretty sure everyone you've played champs with skill shot abilities.
I'm kinda saying the opposite of what you said.

If your biggest issue is coming up against Yas every game, try playing a champ that counters him.

Ideal candidates include Fizz, Azir and Malzahar.

What Lord said, Azir doesn't really counter him, as Zed does, as Yasuo can only block one of his abilities atm






RITO PLZ DONT REWORK ZED IN THE ASSASIN REWORK

Not Azir, Yasuo as enough mobility to keep out of the soldier zones with ease.

Azir's wall is the only thing thats useful against Yasuo, and even then, Yasuo's Q/R goes over it no problem.

Plus Azir is in one of the weakest places he has ever been atm, and Yasuo is in one of the strongest.

Buy Zed, honestly Zed is so much more fun to learn and the outplay potential on that guy is stupid. Literally yasuo gets so boring because late game you come back you are just overpowered asf while Zed actually requires skills. It's not as easy to play Zed in high elos because you get punished if you misposistion your shadow or engage on a dumb fight with your ult.

> [{quoted}](name=LevvyLeviticus,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=uhflKGzn,comment-id=,timestamp=2016-09-11T05:17:23.592+0000)
>
> Yasuo: Pros &amp; Cons.
> Pros:
> Despite having a full difficulty bar, has a very low skill cap

Extremely high skill cap, moderate skill floor.
Shut up, he doesn't. You're just a butthurt Yasuo main
Its like asking "should i get cancer or ebola"

No, Katarina is cancer, and Yasuo is ebola.




Get it right lmao
No theres many strains of cancer, Katarina is like lung cancer or something. Yasuo is like a brain tumour.
Have you seen swain? He's really stupid but very little played. Once you play against a swain whose fed then you will know what I mean

Yea swain is a bitch, but at least swain cant chase you down from halfway down the lane.

Just play Aurelion Sol into Yasuo, then you'll know the meaning of cancer.
